test_cases.test_name: Installation of LIMS Base Module
test_cases.objective: Verify proper installation and configuration of the LIMS installer package on the designated environment.

test_steps.action: Run the installation script on the target server.
test_steps.expected_result: LIMS installation starts without errors and configuration files are generated.

acceptance_criteria: Installation log confirms successful configuration.
data_integrity_requirements: Installation logs must be retained and protected from alteration.
urs_requirements: System installation must support high availability configurations.

test_cases.test_name: Functional Test for Sample Registration
test_cases.objective: Verify that the sample registration functionality meets the defined business requirements by allowing proper sample entry.

test_steps.action: Enter valid sample data into the registration form.
test_steps.expected_result: New sample is registered with a unique barcode and recorded in the system.

acceptance_criteria: Sample registration is accurately recorded and barcode is generated.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure that sample data is accurately captured without corruption.
urs_requirements: System must support traceability of registered samples.

test_cases.test_name: Performance Validation of Test Execution Workflow
test_cases.objective: Assess the performance of test execution workflows ensuring response times meet the required performance standards.

test_steps.action: Trigger simultaneous execution of multiple test workflows.
test_steps.expected_result: All critical operations respond in less than 2 seconds under load.

acceptance_criteria: All critical operations meet the benchmark response time under simulated load.
regulatory_basis: Performance criteria defined in the URS.
data_integrity_requirements: Performance logs must be stored securely to ensure data is unaltered.
urs_requirements: System must support concurrent users with acceptable response times.

test_cases.test_name: Security Validation for Electronic Signatures
test_cases.objective: Confirm that the electronic signature feature meets security and regulatory standards, preventing unauthorized access.

test_steps.action: Attempt an electronic signature using unauthorized credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: The system rejects the signature attempt and creates an audit log entry.

acceptance_criteria: Unauthorized electronic signature attempts are blocked with proper logging.
data_integrity_requirements: Audit logs must be complete and tamper-evident.
urs_requirements: System must enforce stringent electronic signature security controls.

test_cases.test_name: Data Integrity Check During Data Migration
test_cases.objective: Ensure data migration between legacy systems and LIMS retains complete accuracy and integrity.

test_steps.action: Migrate a sample dataset and compare source records with target records.
test_steps.expected_result: Migrated data exactly matches the source data with no discrepancies.

acceptance_criteria: No data discrepancies are observed after migration.
data_integrity_requirements: Data comparison reports must be archived securely.
urs_requirements: Migration must preserve data integrity as defined in the URS.

test_cases.test_name: Integration Testing with ERP System
test_cases.objective: Validate that LIMS successfully exchanges data with the ERP system for accurate inventory management.

test_steps.action: Initiate a data transfer from LIMS to the ERP system.
test_steps.expected_result: ERP system receives updated inventory data correctly and promptly.

acceptance_criteria: Data transfer is confirmed by synchronized records between the systems.
data_integrity_requirements: Data exchange must be logged and transmitted securely.
urs_requirements: Integration must support real-time data updates as per URS.

test_cases.test_name: Functional Test for SOP Integration
test_cases.objective: Verify that Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) are integrated and accessible within the LIMS for test method management.
prerequisites: SOP documents loaded into the system

test_steps.action: Access the SOP section and retrieve documentation linked to test methods.
test_steps.expected_result: All SOP documents are accessible and correctly linked to corresponding test workflows.

acceptance_criteria: All SOP documents are accessible with correct versioning information.
data_integrity_requirements: SOP document versions must remain consistent and unaltered.
urs_requirements: SOP integration functionality must comply with the URS.

test_cases.test_name: Performance Test for Concurrent User Transactions
test_cases.objective: Evaluate LIMS performance by simulating over 200 concurrent user transactions to ensure system stability.

test_steps.action: Simulate 250 concurrent users executing typical LIMS transactions.
test_steps.expected_result: System maintains a response time of less than 2 seconds for all critical operations.

acceptance_criteria: All simulated transactions meet the defined performance criteria without degradation.
data_integrity_requirements: Transaction logs must be complete and securely stored.
urs_requirements: System must support scalable concurrent user activities as defined in the URS.

test_cases.test_name: Security Vulnerability Assessment for Data Access
test_cases.objective: Evaluate the LIMS defense mechanisms against unauthorized data access and potential vulnerabilities.
prerequisites: Test credentials for penetration testing enabled

test_steps.action: Conduct a vulnerability scan on the LIMS application using industry-standard tools.
test_steps.expected_result: No critical vulnerabilities are detected and unauthorized access attempts are blocked.

acceptance_criteria: Security scan reveals no exploitable vulnerabilities and proper audit records are maintained.
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trails must capture all security-related events accurately.
urs_requirements: System must implement robust security controls in line with the URS.

test_cases.test_name: Integration Test with Manufacturing Execution System (MES)
test_cases.objective: Validate the real-time data exchange between LIMS and MES, ensuring timely and accurate updates.

test_steps.action: Trigger a sample test order in LIMS that should update the MES system.
test_steps.expected_result: MES system receives the correct test order data in real time with proper timestamping.

acceptance_criteria: Data exchange is validated with no delays or data loss between LIMS and MES.
data_integrity_requirements: Data transmission logs must remain complete and secure.
urs_requirements: MES integration must ensure real-time updates as specified in the URS.

test_cases.test_name: LIMS Installation and Configuration Validation
test_cases.objective: Verify proper installation and initial configuration of the LIMS system in a controlled environment.

test_steps.action: Install LIMS application using the approved installation guide.
test_steps.expected_result: The system is installed without errors and initial configuration files are generated.

acceptance_criteria: System installed as per manufacturer guidelines
No installation errors detected
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trails enabled during installation process
urs_requirements: PHARMACEUTICAL URS DOCUMENT - TEST VALIDATION SYSTEM: Installation procedures must be validated

test_cases.test_name: LIMS Functional Workflow Execution Validation
test_cases.objective: Ensure LIMS functional workflows work as designed for test execution and sample tracking processes.

test_steps.action: Execute sample registration and test execution workflow under normal conditions.
test_steps.expected_result: Workflow executes successfully with correct sample tracking and data logging.

acceptance_criteria: All functional modules perform as per requirements
data_integrity_requirements: Data entries must be verified for accuracy and traceability
urs_requirements: PHARMACEUTICAL URS DOCUMENT - TEST VALIDATION SYSTEM: Functional workflows definition

test_cases.test_name: LIMS Performance Under Load Validation
test_cases.objective: Verify system performance under expected load conditions with 200+ concurrent users.

test_steps.action: Simulate 200 concurrent users executing critical operations on LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: System response time remains below 2 seconds during simultaneous operations.

acceptance_criteria: Response time < 2 sec under load
No system crashes observed
data_integrity_requirements: Performance logs must be retained for audit
urs_requirements: PHARMACEUTICAL URS DOCUMENT - TEST VALIDATION SYSTEM: Performance requirements specified

test_cases.test_name: LIMS Electronic Signature Security Validation
test_cases.objective: Assess the robustness of the electronic signature and security access controls within LIMS.

test_steps.action: Attempt electronic signature operations using both authorized and unauthorized user credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: Only authorized users can perform electronic signatures and access control logs are generated.

acceptance_criteria: Unauthorized access is denied
Auditing is complete
data_integrity_requirements: Security logs must be complete and unaltered
urs_requirements: PHARMACEUTICAL URS DOCUMENT - TEST VALIDATION SYSTEM: Electronic signature and security requirements

test_cases.test_name: LIMS Data Integrity and Audit Trail Verification
test_cases.objective: Ensure that all data modifications and transactions are logged with complete audit trails.

test_steps.action: Perform a series of data entries, modifications, and deletions while monitoring audit logs.
test_steps.expected_result: Each transaction is recorded with timestamp, user, and change details, maintaining data integrity.

acceptance_criteria: Data audit trails are complete and securely stored
data_integrity_requirements: Audit logs integrity must be verified for each transaction
urs_requirements: PHARMACEUTICAL URS DOCUMENT - TEST VALIDATION SYSTEM: Data integrity requirements

test_cases.test_name: LIMS Integration with MES and ERP Systems
test_cases.objective: Validate the real-time data exchange between LIMS, MES, and ERP systems for inventory and process management.
prerequisites: MES and ERP system connectivity established

test_steps.action: Execute data exchange transactions between LIMS, MES, and ERP systems.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is accurately transferred and synchronized between systems with no loss.

acceptance_criteria: All integration points function as per specifications
data_integrity_requirements: Integration data must maintain consistency and traceability
urs_requirements: PHARMACEUTICAL URS DOCUMENT - TEST VALIDATION SYSTEM: Integration requirements for MES and ERP

test_cases.test_name: LIMS Custom Workflow Configuration Validation
test_cases.objective: Ensure that customized workflows configured for pharmaceutical processes operate correctly and meet regulatory requirements.

test_steps.action: Execute customized workflows for sample management and test approvals.
test_steps.expected_result: Custom workflows function as specified with correct process flow and audit trails.

acceptance_criteria: Custom workflows validated per regulatory guidelines
data_integrity_requirements: Workflow logs must be traceable and intact
urs_requirements: PHARMACEUTICAL URS DOCUMENT - TEST VALIDATION SYSTEM: Customized workflow requirements

test_cases.test_name: LIMS System Performance Under Stress Conditions
test_cases.objective: Evaluate LIMS system performance under stress conditions beyond normal operation thresholds.

test_steps.action: Simulate extreme load conditions exceeding normal user numbers and measure system response.
test_steps.expected_result: System degrades gracefully without data loss or crashes, response times measured.

acceptance_criteria: System maintains critical operations under stress
No data loss observed
data_integrity_requirements: Stress logs maintained for audit purposes
urs_requirements: PHARMACEUTICAL URS DOCUMENT - TEST VALIDATION SYSTEM: Performance requirements under stress conditions

test_cases.test_name: LIMS User Access Control and Privilege Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify that user access controls and privilege management enforce appropriate restrictions on system functionality.

test_steps.action: Test various user roles for access to sensitive operations, including signature and configuration changes.
test_steps.expected_result: Only appropriately authorized users have access to restricted operations.

acceptance_criteria: Access controls strictly enforced as per policies
data_integrity_requirements: User access logs must remain unaltered
urs_requirements: PHARMACEUTICAL URS DOCUMENT - TEST VALIDATION SYSTEM: User access control requirements

test_cases.test_name: LIMS Batch Release and Electronic Signature Validation
test_cases.objective: Test the batch release process and electronic signature functionality during product approval workflows.

test_steps.action: Execute a simulated batch release process requiring electronic signature verification.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch release is approved only after successful electronic signature validation.

acceptance_criteria: Batch not released without compliant electronic signature
Audit logs reflect accurate user actions
data_integrity_requirements: Electronic signature records must match audit logs and be tamper-proof
urs_requirements: PHARMACEUTICAL URS DOCUMENT - TEST VALIDATION SYSTEM: Batch release and electronic signature requirements
